attributes.action: Begin to send troops into Syria and Iraq to exterminate IS or ISIS or ISIL.
attributes.additional_details: Paris attacks, migrant crisis. More is to come!
attributes.background: At the moment 60 million people have been displaced and millions flood to Europe. We cannot have people freezing to death while we sit here and do not sort out the problem. They are a threat to everyone and we need to suppress and ultimately end extremism.
